reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous and classy, with an amazing fit that drapes well over curves without being constricting. They appreciate its comfort, stretchiness, and softness, with one customer noting how the sheer bottom helps camouflage undergarments. The material quality receives mixed feedback - while many find it decent and lightweight, one customer mentions it's not forgiving on a mom's tummy. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Spring dress
items.body: Cute dress. Comfortable and fits well. Light weight fabric, a little sheer at the bottom but has a lining that goes to mid thigh ~ I love it for a spring wedding or party Read more
items.author: Patti

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous dress! So many compliments!
items.body: Beautiful dress! Received so many compliments and I shared the link to this dress to many people! It was very comfortable to wear all night. It fit perfectly, draping over my curve without being constricting! The material was light and comfortable. The colors were beautiful! Love, love, love this dress! Read more
items.author: gr8fulMOM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: True to size very comfortable received lots of compliments for a 65yr old style is perfect with the sheer bottom and fabric is light weight added plus is a great pattern and didn’t wrinkle after washing Read more
items.author: Chris S

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Versatile cute mesh dress
items.body: This dress is as pictured. I ordered a size medium. It's a pretty dress but hard to put on because the lining is attached on the sides. The head hole/collar is also tight since the fabric is not that elastic. The fabric is mesh and not the most comfortable. The dress length sits right above my ankles. I'm 5'3 amd weigh 110lbs". What I dislike about the dress is the lining. It's too short. It doesn't go all the way down to where the ruffle part is. It stops mid thighs. I would recommend hand washing it since the fabric seems very fragile. Overall it's a cute dress. I think you can wear it casually or to a formal event. Read more
items.author: JC

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love!
items.body: This dress is super cute! I am 142lbs and 5’5 for reference, bought a small. It has good stretch and feels soft on your skin. Perfect length if you want this for a more conservative event, I wore it to my graduation. I heat strapless bras so I wore it with a black bra and it still looked stunning. Love the colors, the pink really pops. I have this in two different patterns and I love them. Read more
items.author: Robely Cespedes

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Dress!
items.body: The dress is thin and stretchy, nice material, the slip is attached which makes it easy to put on, there are no visible seams or tags, and the mesh part of the dress has a nice length. I feel that the slip is too short, but it is not awful. Read more
items.author: Alanna Hill

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very cute and very cheaply made
items.body: This dress is very stretchy and pretty flattering. It's very cheaply made but doesn't look too cheap. I'm returning because it probably won't hold up to being washed even once, and the lower tier is sewn on upside down. I'm 5'10" 185 lbs and wear Old Navy size 16/XL. I bought an XL. Read more
items.author: Liz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars In love!!!
items.body: I don’t know how this dress is so inexpensive- I’m in love with it!! Perfect for fall. I’m 5’3 140 lbs and got a small. It isn’t too tight or too lose. Has a nice stretch to it and looks way more expensive than $20. Perfect fall transition piece. Read more
items.author: Caroline Shaw

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Multicolor Floral, Pink Floral, Leopard Print, Blue Floral, Multicolor, Red Rose, Red Floral. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
